events.message: I would like to request a refund for the order I received last week because the product did not meet my expectations and I want to return it.
The customer reported a refund request to return a product that did not meet their expectations.
The case has been assigned to a customer service agent specialized in refunds and returns.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
Could you please share the reason for the refund and confirm if the product has been used or opened?
The product arrived opened and it doesn’t work as described. I want a full refund because it’s unusable.
We can process a full refund for your order and provide you with a prepaid shipping label to return the item at no cost.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the solution and will send the item back as soon as I receive the label.
The refund has been successfully processed and the return shipment label was sent to your email.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for your help and good customer service.
The refund case has been formally closed following confirmation of the successful refund processing.
